name: Crypto Bolivar #003 Cacique Guaicaipuro by Eva Cortez
description:
Guaicaipuro in the Metaverse.

Interpretation of the original banknote, showing our Cacique Guaicaipuro, "Chief of Chiefs", who led the indigenous resistance during the Spanish conquest of Venezuela.

Special edition in the framework of a new monetary reconversion in my country. 

This collection invites us to reflect on the value of fiat money, devaluation and cryptocurrencies as an alternative to safeguard the value of our artistic work.

Digital animation on offer. Animation resolution 1500px x 3351px in GIF format.

Completion date: August 18, 2021. Technique: Digital drawing and 2D animation. Software: Medibang Pain Pro.

With the purchase of each NFT of my authorship you support me with my educational project, through which I introduce Latin American artists, especially women, to the NFT ecosystem, through valuable information that I share on my social networks, making presentations, workshops, lectures, conferences and forums, through which I spread the crypto-art as a revolutionary way to share our art around the world.  

The artwork may not be reproduced commercially. The author reserves the right to use the image of the work for merchandising.

Thank you for supporting my work!
